data.title: About Me
data.text:
I am a London-based corporate photographer working for a range of clients in the Banking, Insurance and Legal sectors as well PR and Events clients. I previously worked for The Sunday Times and The Daily Telegraph before migrating to predominantly corporate work.

I have a vast experience of photographing people in a range of settings, whether it be for posed portraits, at work or at an event, dinner or awards night. This helps me get the best from any given situation as I know what to expect. Luckily, I really enjoy what I do, with every day being a new challenge. With photography, you pretty much only get out what you put in, so I try to engage with my subjects, when required, to put them at their ease and to make the process as painless as possible.

I hope you enjoy looking at the pictures on this site but if you have any questions please contact me and I will be only too happy to discuss something you have in mind.

Thanks and best wishes, Andy

07973 414257

andy@andylane.com

Recent clients include: Deutsche Bank, J P Morgan, RBC Wealth Management, Bain Capital, Apax Partners, Shawbrook Bank, Fidelity Investment, First State Investment, Peel Hunt, Willis Towers Watson, BRIT Insurance, Liberty Global, BMS, Guy Carpenter, Mercer, White & Case LLP, Covington & Burling LLP, Royd Withy King LLP, Milbank Tweed & Hadley LLP, Willkie Farr & Gallagher LLP, Henderson Chambers, 7 Bedford Row, 3 Paper Buildings, 20 Essex Street, Red Consultancy, Hill & Knowlton, Informa Business Information, Euromoney, European CEO, Professional Investor, Hermes RPI, IO Asset Management and The Royal Parks.
